definition: We are most grateful for your valuable assistance.
ancient cooking cauldron with two looped handles and three or four legs/pot (dialect)/to enter upon a period of (classical)/Kangxi radical 206/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes
surname Li
power/force/strength/ability/strenuously
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
surname Xiang
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
to help/to assist

sentences.english: NO04,5. I don't know how to thank you for all your help.
sentences.chinese: 你鼎力相助，我真不知该如何致谢才好。

sentences.english: Red is te symbol of effulgence and brilliance, which also need your help.
sentences.chinese: 红色是灿烂和辉煌的象征，但这也需要您的鼎力相助。

sentences.english: In troubled times, though, they mean that the EU struggles to act.
sentences.chinese: 在困难时期，则意味着欧盟在鼎力相助。

sentences.english: We are extremely grateful to you for the trouble you have taken on our behalf.
sentences.chinese: 多蒙鼎力相助，不胜感谢。

sentences.english: Lent support when the glass rises and, this time.
sentences.chinese: 在酒杯端起之时鼎力相助，此刻。

sentences.english: We thank him for all his help.
But she does it with a lot of help from a nanny.
sentences.chinese: 不过，她是在保姆的鼎力相助下才办到的。

sentences.english: We thanked them for all their help.
sentences.chinese: 我们感谢他们的鼎力相助。

sentences.english: At the highest level, to get our political leadership to make the effort that’s required to safeguard nature.
sentences.chinese: 捍卫自然的完整还必须得到政治领导阶层的鼎力相助。

definition: to help one another/to aid
necessarily
settled/ready/finished

to lead by the hand/to guide/to support
